item.title: The Impact of the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) on Contracting
item.description: Explore how the National Defense Authorization Act transforms defense contracting, spearheads innovation, and reshapes the future of national security.

item.title: Using the System for Award Management (SAM) Exclusions List to Vet Subcontractors
item.description: Discover how leveraging the SAM Exclusions List can enhance your subcontractor vetting process for better compliance and risk management.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Implementing Continuous Improvement Practices in Government Contracting
item.description: Exploring how continuous improvement practices can revolutionize government contracting by making it more efficient, transparent, and responsive to change.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Developing a Conflict of Interest Policy for Government Contracting
item.description: Explore the essential steps and key considerations in creating a robust Conflict of Interest Policy for government contracting to ensure transparency and fairness.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: The Importance of Performance Evaluations for Government Contractors
item.description: Dive into why performance evaluations are essential for government contractors, ensuring quality, accountability, and progress in public projects.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Transitioning from Subcontractor to Prime Contractor: Strategies for Growth
item.description: Unlock your potential by transforming from a subcontractor to a prime contractor. Explore strategic steps to ensure a seamless and successful transition.

item.title: Leveraging Small Business Administration (SBA) Resources for Contracting Success
item.description: Discover how the Small Business Administration (SBA) can be a game-changer for small businesses seeking to break into government contracting. Learn about the myriad resources and programs SBA offers to help your business soar.

item.title: Leveraging Procurement Technical Assistance Centers (PTACs) for Contracting Success
item.description: Discover how Procurement Technical Assistance Centers (PTACs) can boost your business contracting efforts. From expert guidance to invaluable resources, learn how PTACs can be a game-changer for your contracting success.
item.author: ericdequevedo@gmailcom (Eric deQuevedo)

item.title: Ethics and Integrity in Government Contracting: Maintaining High Standards
item.description: Exploring the crucial role of ethics and integrity in government contracting and how maintaining high standards ensures transparent, fair, and effective procurement processes. This post delves into the key aspects and benefits while uncovering best practices in the field.
